name: vectorp

sections.text: Returns true if object is of type vector; otherwise, returns false.

(vectorp "aaaaaa") =>  true
      (vectorp (make-array 6 :fill-pointer t)) =>  true
      (vectorp (make-array '(2 3 4))) =>  false
      (vectorp #*11) =>  true
      (vectorp #b11) =>  false

_otext:
File: gcl.info,  Node: vectorp,  Next: bit,  Prev: vector-push,  Up: Arrays Dictionary

vectorp                                                          [Function]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

`vectorp'  object =>  generalized-boolean

Arguments and Values::
......................

object--an object.

generalized-boolean--a generalized boolean.

Description::
.............

Returns true if object is of type vector; otherwise, returns false.

Examples::
..........

      (vectorp "aaaaaa") =>  true
      (vectorp (make-array 6 :fill-pointer t)) =>  true
      (vectorp (make-array '(2 3 4))) =>  false
      (vectorp #*11) =>  true
      (vectorp #b11) =>  false

Notes::
.......

      (vectorp object) == (typep object 'vector)
